thread.title: Runnin' Utes ranked No. 16 in preseason Coaches Poll; 3rd in Pac-12 Media Poll
thread.title_full: Runnin' Utes ranked No. 16 in preseason Coaches Poll; 3rd in Pac-12 Media Poll

title: Runnin' Utes ranked No. 16 in preseason Coaches Poll; 3rd in Pac-12 Media Poll
text:
Runnin' Utes ranked No. 16 in preseason Coaches Poll; 3rd in Pac-12 Media Poll By Josh Furlong | Posted Oct 15th, 2015 @ 11:41am 0  
SALT LAKE CITY — The national rankings continue for Utah athletics as the Runnin' Utes were voted into the Top 25 of the USA Today Coaches Poll Thursday. 
The Utes were voted as the No. 16 team in the preseason Coaches Poll following last year's berth to the Sweet 16 in the NCAA Tournament. The Utes are one of three teams from the Pac-12 included in the Coaches Poll, with Arizona coming in at No. 10 and California at No. 14. Utah will play California twice (Jan. 3 and Jan. 27) and Arizona once (Feb. 27) this season. 
Utah will also face two non-conference opponents ranked in the Top 25, including No. 4 Duke and No. 12 Wichita State. Utah will travel to Kansas to play Wichita State on Dec. 12 and then a Sweet 16 rematch against Duke at Madison Square Garden on Dec. 19. 
The Utes were also slated to finish third in the preseason Pac-12 Media Poll Thursday, following Arizona and California. Utah received seven first-place votes, behind Arizona's 18 votes and California's nine votes. Oregon and UCLA each received one first-place vote. Behind the top three in the Pac-12 Poll is Oregon, UCLA, Oregon State, Colorado, Arizona State, Stanford, USC, Washington and Washington State. 
Utah will begin play on Nov. 5 at 7 p.m. with an exhibition game against Cal State Monterey Bay. The Utes open up the regular season on Nov. 13 at 7:30 p.m. at the Huntsman Center against Southern Utah. Josh Furlong
